title: Calculating Differences Stuck at 0% i file scaned
body: Need help my League of Legends is stuck at 0% 1 file scanned, i tried everything solution that has been posted. If anyone has any ideas on how to help me please LMK!!!! TY!!

replies.body: Your patcher needs to have access to scan and update files, otherwise you'll receive unspecified errors or just get stuck.  Go over our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to help configure your settings and allow access.  This should get you squared away!
